segments.text: Observing this, the woman's attention is solely on the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel's bunched up as she polishes it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the faucet runs and the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, but she carries on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are open, revealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the jar is daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's cooperating, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup screams accident imminent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes on the counter add to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's view of the garden is serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the inside feel even more chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
